question: 14 and still no period?
question_content: Im 14 years old and just started high school and i still haven't started my period! i know, i know, you're going to say that it's normal not to get you're period until you're sixteen years old and i'm just a late bloomer, but here's the problem: My breasts started growing probably about 3 years ago in sixth grade, i have hair "down there" and i have had a white sticky discharge for about a year. My mom got her period when she was 13! Am i ok, or is something wrong and do I need to see a doc?

answers.answer_content: With the signs you have been having, it seems like you should get your period within the next year.  14 is a little bit late to start your period, but I would say just enjoy the time you have left without it!  Once you get it, you'll wish you never started it!  Also, just because your mom got her period when she was 13, it doesn't necessarily affect when you will get yours.  My mom and all of my female relatives got theirs when they were 14 or 15 and I started mine just after I turned 11.  Everyone's body is different and you'll start when your body is ready to start.  Good luck!  I hope this helps!

your exactly the same as me,  I'm a freshman in highschool I'm 14 and my mom started at 13, my breast started growing three years ago also, and I've been experiencing that white discharge for little over a year. I swear you could be my twin haha jk I already have an identical twin sister who also hasn't started. Trust me your not alone I have tons of friends who haven't started yet even some that are 16 and 17. My mom said that I will start probably start before Christmas, and if your anything like me you'll start around the same time. Besides enjoy it, who wants to bleed one a month for the next 4 decade. I'm enjoying it ,we'll probably find out what it's like very soon.just be patient that's all you can do. Don't wort I so see when I'll start cuz I want I be prepared. 

Good luck
Hope this helps

You are fine hun!! Not every thing clicks into place at the same time. Nobody has a set schedule for puberty, it just shows up when it shows up. Trust me, its gonna happen.
dont wish for it lol, some people get i late or whenever. this girl i know didnt get hers until she was like 18
